Class NearStopOverlayItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • OverlayItem
      • edu.illinois.geoalarm.NearStopOverlayItem

  • public class NearStopOverlayItem
extends OverlayItem
    An implementation of OverlayItem, used to show nearby bus stops
    Author:
    GeoAlarm
